full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title (English):** Solar Purification System
* **Tender Title (French):** Système de purification des solvants
* **Reference Number:** WS4257876624-Doc4340129878
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4257876624
* **Publication Date:** December 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Solicitation Overview

* **Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Category:** Procurement under the Government of Canada's procurement category
* **Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Alberta

## Supplier Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact:** Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Information for Purpose of This Solicitation:** Provided through Ariba Discovery. 

## Description of Goods and/or Services

CanmetÉNERGIE Devon (CE-D) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) Solvent Purification System with capacity to purify 7 different solvents. The system will be used to purify commonly used laboratory organic solvents required for the synthesis of advanced materials for hydrogen storage, purification; and carbon-dioxide capture & conversion.

## Debriefing/Feedback

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror’s who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.
